attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I couldn't be sure if my petition of a few days ago was received. I pointed out what a potential vote loser Post office closures are. If my local post office were to close I would be considerably disadvantaged as I am 86 and have motor neurone disease and unable to drive like so many elderly without a car. Taking away the traditional business of these Post offices will make their figures look bad as with any business. Awarding the TV Licence business to a private concern means they are making a handsome profit the P.O. might have had.Please consider  the over all picture and call a halt to these closures which are so wrong.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for action, not a statement / name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
